tossup_question: 34) BIOLOGY Multiple choice CD79a is considered a marker for which of the following?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Non-neural epithelial cells
X) T helper cells 
Y) Pancreatic delta cells
Z) B cells
bonus_question: 34) BIOLOGY  The mRNA sequence for a short polypeptide is AUG UAC CGC AGU UAA. When the sixth nucleotide in the sequence is changed to G, which of the following mutations has occurred?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Missense
X) Nonsense 
Y) Silent
Z) Frameshift
